Where they live: Diamond City (mixture of Tokyo and New York)
Bio: Matilda Everlone is a very sweet girl with a seemingly ordinary life, unless you can call that given the fact that she is a 170ft tall, wearing a bikini all the time and has giant monster like abilities like being able to breathe fire from her mouth. Well let's go back to where this entire story begins. Her parents worked at a science company and one day they brought their daughter to work when they were experimenting with some new DNA sample, somehow an accident occurred and the sample tube broke right on Matilda. Suddenly, she ended up growing to gigantic height and was able to breathe fire as well. At first the entire population of Diamond City was terrified, but they soon grew to adore and like her when she showed that she was still friendly and such, and now she helps out with construction works, demolitions, and other things across the city as a creature known to all as Matildgon. She is also a huge Japanese giant monster fan, so she does act, roar, and stomp around like a kaiju all the time, but thankfully is careful where she goes and lands her stomps. She is going through some issues like being forced to live in the mountains (although the scientists grow foods and her swimsuits as clothes as the others don't work for some reason), having to wear a bikini all the time, being homeschooled, etc.
Additional Info: None

So what do you wanna do with her?

1113.content:
It was just your typical average day in good ole Diamond City all the people were just starting their daily routines going to work,kids getting on the bus for school,or just getting breakfast when out of the blue came the tremors things like car alarms went off and a few building and store department windows rattled but none of the people even bothered to scream or run around like crazy even as the huge shadow appeared blocking out the sun and all anyone could see was the massive outline of a young girl around seven years old dressed in a two piece bikini smiling down at them Matilda beamed happily as she stared at the puzzled,frightened crowds then said
"Hello little people!" Rather than run and scream like most people would do when confronted by a gigantic monster some of the townspeople simply called back

Matilda said as she slowly began walking down the street careful to where she was stepping people actually moved out of the way respectfully for the young giant then she sat down in a empty park of the street and stared down at the tiny citizens
"So how's everyone doing today?"
"Fine thank you for asking and yourself?"
"Very good I'm only going to be here for a short while as I promised my parents I would be back home around noon so before I go does anyone need any help with anything?" As she stared around for signs of trouble Matilda noticed something else,something incredibly large as big as her coming from the horizon and she gasped
"Uh oh!" It was no doubt another giant she only hoped it whatever it was was friendly and speaking of which what kind of giant are we talking about?

113.content:
Name: Chloe
Kaiju Name: Chloezilla
Age: 6
Hair style and color: Strawberry blonde with a ponytail.
Eye color: Blue
Skin: Fair.
Height: 500 feet.
Clothes: A pink one piece bikini.
Powers: She is incredibly strong and durable, and she is able to breathe underwater and can fire a beam of atomic energy from her mouth or blasts of lightning or gravity power from her hands. She can also roar like a kaiju.
Where they live: New York City
Bio: Chloe was a sweet little girl who loved small animals and sometimes got picked on at school because she was the shortest kid in her class. She often dreamed of being huge and powerful so she could help out tiny people and would never get picked on. One day, she got her wish when she was a mysterious orb of rainbow-colored light appeared in her room and was absorbed into her body. The orb made her grow to 500 feet tall and gave her incredible powers. Her parents and everyone else in New York City were horrified at first to see this titanic little girl, but Chloezilla showed them that she was a sweet and gentle kaiju girl who just wanted to help tiny people and be friends with them. She likes to play at being a giant monster sometimes, but she is always careful not to cause any actual harm, and she helps the people of New York City whenever they have need of someone very big and strong. In return for Chloe's kindness, the people constructed a special enclosure for her to live in, and even made giant toys for her to play with.
Additional Info: Before she grew, she was very close with her teenaged big brother, Zack, who often protected her from bullies or comforted her when she had a bad dream. Nowadays, she often snuggles with Zack in her sleep, and she's thrilled at being big enough to protect him now.
113.title: Free Spot 3

choices: Chloe's playful rampage is interrupted by the people needing her assitance
1132.content:
Chloezilla woke up one bright Saturday morning, her "big" brother Zack snuggled in her arms like a teddy bear. "Wake up, Zack, it's a new day!" she said as she tickled her brother gently to wake him up. "Morning, Chloe, what should we do today?" he said as he woke up, still somewhat groggy. "Well, first, let's have pancakes for breakfast, and then we can play in my virtual city!" she said as she got up and placed Zack on the walkways that their home had for normal-sized people like him. The siblings walked into the kitchen, in which there was a kaiju-sized table for Chloe with a human-sized table for her family sitting on it. However, Chloe and Zack's parents were away on a business trip, so only Zack would be eating breakfast at the human-sized table today. A huge machine made giant pancakes for Chloe, while Zack was served normal-sized pancakes by a normal waiter who worked at the facility the people had built for Chloe and her family.

After the siblings had finished their pancakes, Chloe picked up her tiny older brother and said "Ok, it's rampage time!" She carried him to her virtual reality room, which looked like a bare black and white room when not in use. "Computer, I want a life-sized city, and a helicopter for Zack so he can watch me rampage from a safe distance." Once the computer had done what she requested, Chloezilla stomped into the city and began rampaging. "Rawr! Look out, little people, here comes Chloezilla!" she roared playfully as she stomped through the streets, crushing tiny cars and buildings beneath her enormous little girl kaiju feet. Next, she blasted away a huge chunk of the city with her atomic breath, then she set a cluster of tall buildings on fire with lightning blasts from her hands.
1132.title: Show her playing with her family and her giant ...

11322.content:
(Zack's POV)

I have to admit in my head, just seeing my gigantic 6 year old sister in her cute pink swimsuit playing Godzilla in the virtual city was just a joy that I always hope that would happen, and it did. At first when she did grew I was totally terrified beyond belief, but at the very same time I was incredibly amazed that my dream did end up happening. You see, when I was young, I imagine a gigantic woman of any age in a bikini, with Godzilla like powers going on an epic rampage in the city, roaring and using their powers to lay waste to an entire city. The creature would been called Girlzilla for sure, but luckily I do have a Girlzilla now, and it is my little sister, and I am so happy for her. You know, I actually do wanna join in on the fun now.

"Hey Siszilla!" I called out to her from the helicopter. I also call her Girlzilla and Siszilla from time to time, and she doesn't mind me calling her those names, as she does like them.

"What my brother?" She asked happily.

"How would you like to play a game of...?"

(Chapters: https://www.writing.com/main/interact/it... https://www.writing.com/main/interact/it...). It seems that the love of the giant monster girls was so great, that the city of Japan decided they needed one more. Now how they did this, with a contest to see which girl has the most desire to become the biggest and most monstrous girl of them all. Well it turns out that this little girl name Soya has won that contest. She has been an avid giant monster and giantess fan when she was just young and her mother introduced her to their movies over the years, but her favorite was the crossover Shinkzukazilla vs Harukagon as her two favorite monsters battle it out in Tokyo, and immense destruction was cause. She loved it so much that she desired to be the third monster girl, and the most monstrous of them all. Well the government saw that so they used the formula created by both Haruka and Shinkzuka's DNA (at their approval) to make the girl into a giant monster as well. The city also really celebrated having another monster girl so they gave her the monster treatment (we will get into that in future chapters.). There is so much that I can get into this character that we will just have her just being started just to give her character depth. Not much but enough to get started. Shinkzuka is glad to have another giant girl to be a monster with, and while Haruka likes having another friend, she does feel the love for the giant girls is getting a little bit overhand so she tries to teach her the more easy things. Shinzuka is going to make Soya into a real monster however.
Additional Info: She has big breast for a girl her age, and she is in training so accidents will occur like crushed cars and what not. Also, Haruka and Shinzuka are big parts of the story so refer to them as well. Now we got 3 monster girls now. She is also the most monstrous of the 3 girls with her roars and immense strength. The whole city will know her as a true monster.

115322.content:
Soya or known by her full name Soyasaurous was incredibly nervous today as she had just met two other gigantic girls close to her own height and was about to be trained by both named Haruka and Shinkzuka both all too glad to do so in how to be a monster or to put it mildly a Kaiju.

"Okay Soya here's the first thing you have to do....." Said Haruka the first of the girls as the three were at a vast distant location faraway from the population practicing "First crouch down and try to build up the energy within you and......" But the other girl spoke up

"Eh? Maybe we should save the energy bursting thing for later for now let's just focus on the easy stuff." Shinkzuka said firmly

"Right,right okay first thing pretend you're in a populated city stuffed with people who just noticed you appearing over the horizon and they just started running and screaming now what do you do?" Harkura asked

"Eh? Try and convince them that I mean no harm?" Soya said both other girls exchanged eye rolls

"Eh no! You can do that a big later! Right now we're just starting out well the first thing you do is simply take your first steps into the city,roar a few times and...." But Soya interputted her

"Those things I already know I mean come on its basic Monster lesson 101 isn't it? I thought you guys were going to teach me something really useful about this whole 'Kaiju' thing?" The other girl spoke up

"We are! But we're starting at the bottom of the barrel so to speak so you can get the hang of it now as Harkura said following a few stomps and a couple of roars to spook the crowd a bit then you want to unleash a few fiery blasts at buildings and........."

"Ahem....." Said Harkura clearing her throat

"I mean just continuing walking down the street scaring the folk for a bit then just for fun unleash one or two fire blasts......" But once again she was interputted

"I was wondering for a while now girls what exactly does a Kaiju do? I mean what is the purpose?" Soya asked

"Er you take this one I'm not sure how to explain it!" Shinkzuka said to Harkura "After all she's your trainee isn't she?"

"You're kidding right? You watched plenty of Godzilla movies haven't you? You've been a fan of our work(gesturing to her and Shinkzuka)? There's a lot more to being a Kaiju or giant monster of any kind or species than just rampaging and destroying stuff we can be good or evil or a mixture of both depending on our personalities so in other words we can either choose to be the city or town's savior or destroyer now as for our powers well it all depends on the source of our origins or creations basically we can possess every type of power or super-power under the sun okay? You understand the basics of what it means to be a Kaiju now?" Soya nodded

"Yeah I guess so alright after the rampaging and roars and energy blasts what happens next?"

"Well that's normally around the time when the military shows up and a stand off begins between the Kaiju and them being that you're a Godzilla fan you probably know what happens then either we can surrender to them or resist and try and destroy them in the process or often ourselves." Harkura explained

"And that's it?" Soya asked feeling a bit let down

"Yeah pretty much unless we forgotten something did we?"

"Nope I don't think so....oh wait one more thing if another giant monster shows up and a fight breaks out between the two the best thing to do is to either fight like mad or just try and get out of there especially if the other monster is more experienced than you but that's always not the case remember that bigger doesn't always mean better or stronger!" 1411212112.content:
"Let's go to the railway", Cassie replied excitedly. The AFR (Ashton Finel Railway) was a nearby railway that was established a very long time ago. It had steam, diesel, and electric engines. One diesel, nicknamed The Little Diesel Engine, was shunting freight cars into a siding for another engine to pull. Another engine, a steam engine nicknamed Big Green, was pulling a passenger train. The railway would take passengers to and from many places, including Seattle, WA, England, Scotland, Australia, Japan, China, France, Germany, Russia, and other places.

When Cassie and Kyle arrived, the Head of the Railway was furious. "What's she doing here", he shouted. "I can't run my railway with her stomping about!" Kyle was rather annoyed. "We're only visiting", he said. Just then, heard a loud horn. Cassie looked down and noticed her foot was on one of the tracks, and was blocking the path of a freight train that was heading in her direction. Cassie tried to move her large foot out of the way, but it was too late. The freight train crashed into her foot and came right off the track. Luckily no one was hurt, but the engine and the freight cars were piled up in a heap, with the caboose and the last two cars still on the tracks. The Head of the Railway was really angry now. "Look what you've done", he exclaimed. "Who's going to clean up this mess!?"
1411212112.title: Accidents Will Happen

The Head of the Railway said, "Thank you", and Cassie and Kyle headed back to the city (which wasn't very far). When they got there, Cassie was very tired. "I think I'll take a nap", she told Kyle.

Luna can even summon the souls of the dammed to do her bidding as well, despite her seemingly evil side, she's VERY CONFLCITED with her powers ruleing the world, destroying it, both sound good, yet at the same time...she'd also like to be loved.
1551.title: Free Spot 5

15513.content:
Luna was conflicted to say the least, people knew of her existence yet not what she could do. Other than her size she had rarely used her powers openly before. It made quite an impact on the internet however. "I heard she can breath fire!" or "She can shoot lasers from her eyes I bet!!" and "I bet she's actually an alien from another world!!" Millions of rumors, none confirmed, Luna didn't read these posts however, she spent most of her time in a sort of stasis. A sleep-like state where she would merely think, what went through a being like her mind. Thoughts about this 'sister' that perhaps was merely made up so she did not feel alone? Maybe thoughts of how to use her powers? One could only guess.

What was actually going on was Luna feeling sick, not in body but her emotions, with powers like hers she was a threat to the world, so how does one so powerful just...blend in? Maybe if she were normal sized she wouldn't have troubles, and if she were to conquer the world then it would be under her rule, or if she were to just "Lose it" and destroy it...what would be the point, power like this was terrifying to her. Yet as such a young adult she didn't have guidance. A soft voice snapped her out of her thoughts.

"So you're Luna? Wow...you're beautiful!" Looking down at her leg she saw
15513.title: First use of power

choices: Luna takes a walk carrying Nanami
Luna doesn't want to go anywhere
Luna takes a walk but doesn't quite care what she steps on.
155132.content:
Luna was shocked. for someone to even approach her was rare. There was another girl in the area but Luna didn't quite know her, not very well anyways. "Yes..." Was all Luna said. The girl was rather tall herself at around 6'6, maybe? She had pink hair, likely dyed and wore a white dress open in the front showing off her long toned legs. Rather large breasts as well. Luna had to admit for a human she was rather good looking. "And you?"

"Nanami." The girl said bowing politely.

"Don't bother bowing." Luna snapped. "Bowing is for a person to a person in this country, I'm not a person."

"I disagree." Nanami said with a smile. "You're just big and powerful. But you're still a person." Luna was shocked. She held out her hand and lifted the girl by her very soul. The girl floated into her hand. "You're not wrong, I can raise the dead to do my bidding, I can call meteors down. Souls which hold creativity are...especially powerful. Although I can make the powers they dream up my own and real too as I drink them in. Of course this makes them mindless zombies."

"That's scary." Nanami said as she took a seat on Luna's palm.She still smiled though.

"Why do you smile. I can easily do the same to you!!" Luna growled.

"But you won't." Nanami gave a heartwarming smile. "I know you won't."

"How?" Luna asked with cold eyes.

"Simple." Nanami rubbed Luna's palm with her hand. "Because you're happy to have someone to talk to, but you're also afraid of being hurt again."

"WHAT?!" Luna half yelled. It was enough for Nanami to cover her ears. "How did you know this?!"

"Because...Your words maybe cold but your facial expressions show pain and confusion along with a deep amount of sadness." Who was this girl? How did she see so well? Luna sighed. Nanami was right.

"You're not wrong..." She mumbled.

"Hey? Lets go for a walk, you could carry me and we can talk about stuff...please?"
155132.title: A young woman?

155133.content: Say, maybe a bunch of children, boys and girls visiting a goddess?
155133.title: Any other choices?

choices: Yes, Luna takes their advice to heart and decides to do some good deeds
No, but appreciates them for advice though
1551331.content:
Luna looks below to see at least 3 kids standing before her feet, all of elementary height roughly. Luna and see that two of them are young boys no older than 10, and the youngest one of the group was a girl at the age of 6. (I know it isn’t much kids, but figured that a group doesn’t always have to be so many.) They were wearing the standard school uniforms that their high end schools provided them, and just seeing them before her, she could only leave with a bit of a soft smile as cold as she might see to be. She is still a bit cold, but she leaves a bit of a smile.

“Hi little ones, just coming to see me.” She said, slightly annoyed, but softer than her other responses.

“Yeah Luna, just coming to see you. Anything up lately?” The young girl then asked her, hoping to cheer her up a bit. “You look so down.”

“Yeah, that is true, maybe I am just homesick or something. I mean, being big and powerful surely doesn’t leave you a lot of opportunities to have fun or be useful, unless you are Soyumi, Sakura, or those others who seems to being monsters all the time with monster names that y’all call us. I swore someone call me Lunazilla, but I just wanna be called Luna.” She said a bit down, but smiled a bit.

“So, you just wish you can be useful at your massive height with your powers?” One of the boys asked. “i think you could make an incredible superhero.”

“You know, I think I could. That is actually a great advice there. But let me ask you all this, especially the girl. If you were this big and everyone sees you like a monster, how would you feel?”

“Well, that depends if they are scared of just love me.” The girl replied.

“I guess you have a point there... I mean, I just want to be useful for a change around here. But... I wish they can see me for the real me, and not just some towering monster sized girl like they do with Sakura and Soyumi and many others, and if by some means y’all were giants, don’t you want to be seen for the kind person that you are, or just some monster?”

“Ourselves.” They said.

(Remember they are no male giants, but I figure I state a question here for them in order to get Luna to teach a good lesson.)

“Say, you should go out every so often and try being more open?” the girl then said, hoping to get Luna to go out for a bit.

Does it succeed?
1551331.title: A Soft Smile in her Heart

1552.content:
Name: Sakura Ekizo
Kaiju Name: Called various names like Sakurazilla, the Goddess of Beauty and Destruction, Terror Titan, among others, and she really enjoys being called those names.
Age: 22
Hair style and color: A simple short but not too short blackish brown hair
Eye color: Green
Skin: White
Height: Her forms can range from 100ft as a youngest kid form around age 6, to her current state of 300ft as an adult, she can adjust her height and age appearances at her own will, each with their advantages and disadvantages (She is still 22, but her personality explains her abilities)
Clothes: She wears a gold like slippers and only wears a white bra and panties outfit, but has a solid body. Her age changing abilities also affects her clothes as well, allowing them to adjust.
Powers: Near invincibility like Luna, fire breath, monster roar, regeneration, and also age adjusting, also body manipulation of her breasts and butt if she wanted to
Where they live: Just like Luna, Tokyo in Japan, but also tends to visit other cities in Japan as well.

Bio: Sakura is currently a descendant of the goddess of destruction and beauty who has recently went on to the next stage of their goddesshood, She is next in line and has prepared her whole life for this moment. Deep down she wants to be a friendly and helping, but also an awesome goddess who will take their rightful place as rulers, but let’s just say she is going to have a blast while she does it. She and her mother over the young years have watched plenty of monster movies like Godzilla and Gamera as she imagine herself as a kaiju and wants to take a spin on her time as goddess while also still being friendly as well. Her mother is extremely supportive of her and being a fan of the Goddesses herself, she can see why she is one day hoping for that. Then one day it has finally happened, and Sakura became a goddess herself and awakens her powers. But one power she finds interesting other than her giant monster like ones like roars and fire breath, is how she can adjust her age and body appearances, letting her change her height as well in the process. She imagined her self as a kid one day and then suddenly she is then a kid again in appearance and height wise, getting her dream in the process. Then she adjusts back at her own choice, and it does. Well, the rest of the story comes soon so let’s get into the writing.

Additional info: She is a really fun loving girl, but is lucky to be careful with what she does as a goddess, but a part of her fun is acting like a giant monster attacking the city. So she stomps around and roars like kaiju a lot, and even rises from the ocean or makes big monster openings as well. She currently has lots of fans, especially children who she is a sucker for as she wants to bring joy to the world, and sometimes uses her younger forms to be like a kid monster to them. She does plenty of favors around the city also, like demolitions and stuff,

Big note, this story takes place in the same universe as Luna’s, so refer to this link here for more details.

https://www.writing.com/main/interact/it...

So where do you wanna start?
1552.title: Free Spot 6

choices: She takes them to see a playful rampage with their teacher
She decides to play with the kids a bit
15522.content:
A new day dawn’s on the goddesses reign over Tokyo, Japan as the people of the city were seen going to work or school depending if you were an adult or kid. The streets were bright and was busy with all the usual traffic that you would expect in a major city like this, but there is something that now heads this way that is going to make their normally boring day a true site to behold.

Out in the ocean, there was a sudden shift of water as it seems to be a figure heading toward’s the city. Even the ground was rumbling really hard as the figure was actually underwater, stomping towards the city. Under the water was Sakura herself in her adult form, ready to give the appearance of a life time. Sakura was smiling just as she approaches the city that she calls home, as she was going there today to have some giant sized fun, and as a goddess, she comes here regularly to visit, and luckily all the people were nice to adjust their roads and everything to allow the goddesses to roam the city, and soon the appearance of her would been seen.

Some kids were playing at recess by a school near the ocean when they see the waters rapidly acting up, and then a kid who was just a young girl turns her attention to the ripples in the water. “Hey fellas, look at this.... Sakura is about to appear.” She shouted. Suddenly, all the kids and their teacher who was happy then turn to see the figure begin to rise out of the water. First revealing brow in hair, along with the white face with brown eyes. She was smiling just as she rises from the water, revealing more and more, like her bra and panties just as she awakens. After she was fully out of the water, stomping right near the school and a random area at 300ft tall, she then emits a kaiju like roar in the area, and it was so loud and defeaning that many covered their ears, and it sounded monster like. It lasted for a few seconds before suddenly she turns to see the kids there, and she smiles. “Well hi there little ones, I am the mighty Sakura, Goddess of Beauty and Destruction.” She roared! And all the kids cheered for their goddess.

What does she do?

info.brief_description: Trying to have a normal life is hard when you're gigantic...
info.description:
You know, sometimes life is extremely tough for everyone, and sometimes life is like given to you on a silver plate. Well in this new giantess story, you get to see a new side of life that you have never seen the girls before. The girls by some means grew to gigantic monster like sizes and you would think they would become good or evil, but in actually, they are just trying to go through the same thing we do in life. Go to school or work, learn or work, go to bed, sleep, etc. Well imagine having to do all of that as a giantess with giant monster like powers and is known to the people as a giant monster, either accepted and loved by the public, or feared and trashed by everyone. The difference in this story is that they don't go suddenly on a huge rampage and kill everything and everyone, here they are trying to solve this life problem without violence. Hence the title of this new giantess kaiju interactive... "A Typical Life as a Kaiju Giantess".

Now of course it ain't all typical, sometimes they can be well known and liked as a celebrity. But the difference in this kaiju giantess story is that they are going through life issues, but on a whole another scale, one that is gigantic sized. And also they have other issues like how to get around the city without destroying stuff, clothing they were, where they live, and etc. I kinda want to go for that type of feel in this new story. Slice of Life Drama Sci-Fi Fantasy kaiju adventure. Who knows, maybe some romance even.

Also, all of the giant girls in this story will have a kaiju name, and if you want to be simple, just add a Zilla at the end of the name. The government will register that being as a kaiju.

Alright, time to get to the rules.

No Male Giants

No Vore since this is not an evil story as I am focusing on life issues on this one, and other stuff, don't want this turning into an eating story

No sexual content for the younger than 13 crowd, please, I will get in real trouble for this

No unbirth

No switching genders

No nudity

Please make your additions at least a paragraph long, as I will delete those who break this rule
No scat

You can make more than one giantess in a route

Leave more than one option for the other guys so they can make their characters when you use the open slots (which will be made soon)

The format must be completed in its entirely for the character to be made, now if you have a photo of the girl you want to use, you can ignore the hair style, skin, eye color, and clothes part, just put a link of the photo at the end, and make sure it's workable

Scale-wise, 12 inches is a foot. Perhaps for Kaiju size, time it by 40 or 50.

Have fun

And the format to make your character

Bio: (Explain how they grew, and their whole background story)

info.pretty_title: ATypical Life as a Kaiju Giantess
